name: Yakuza Taxman
description:
DESCRIPTION

Yakuza Taxman is a type-racer based around a man filing the Yakuza's taxes.

INSTRUCTIONS

- Fill in the tax form using the information on the post-it note
- Press to move onto the next field on the tax form
- Press to move to the previous field on the tax form
- Press to submit the completed tax form
- Be careful not to run out of time!

CREDITS

- Evan Laflamme
- Justin Tremblay
- Michael Vaquier
- Eric Vuong
